title: Tolix Bar Stool Silver
body: Xavier Pauchard cannot hide his love for metals when he designed the Tolix Bar Stool in 1934, known as a master of metalwork, he applied everything he knew about galvanized iron and created numerous metal furnitures. The Tolix stools had become an icon of industrial design and made their way into cafés, offices, hospitals, public parks and terraces. Stylish, solid, durable and inexpensive, the Tolix dining chair and bar stool have made into many homes.
